en: Let not your heart be troubled: believe in God, believe also in me.
hmr: “In lungril lunginzîng naw raw se; Pathien in ring, kei khawm mi ring ve ro.

en: In my Father’s house are many mansions; if it were not so, I would have told you; for I go to prepare a place for you.
hmr: Ka Pa inah umna tamtak a um a, a um naw chun ka hril ta ding cheu a nih; in ta dingin hmun siemin ka fe ding a nih.

en: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I come again, and will receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
hmr: Chun, in ta dinga hmun ka hang siem chun hung kîr nâwk ka ta, ka kuomah lâng ka ti cheu; ka umnaah nangni khawm in um theina dingin.

en: And whither I go, ye know the way.
hmr: Ka fena ding a lampui chin in hriet ie,” a ta.

en: Thomas saith unto him, Lord, we know not whither thou goest; how know we the way?
hmr: Thoman a kuomah, “Lalpa, i fena ding chin kan hriet naw annaw, a lam- pui iengtin am hrieng kan ta?” a ta.

en: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, and the truth, and the life: no one cometh unto the Father, but by me.
hmr: Isûn a kuomah, “Kei hi lampui le thutak le hringna ka nih; keimaa fe naw chu tukhawm Pa kuom an tlung ngai nawh.

en: If ye had known me, ye would have known my Father also: from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.
hmr: Kei mi hrie ni unla chu, ka Pa khawm in hriet ta ding bah; tuta inthawk chu ama in hriet tah, ama in hmu ta bawk,” a ta.

en: Philip saith unto him, Lord, show us the Father, and it sufficeth us.
hmr: Philipin a kuomah, “Lalpa, Pa chu keini mîn hmutir ta la, chuongchun, kan ta dingin hun a tih,” a ta.

en: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and dost thou not know me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; how sayest thou, Show us the Father?
hmr: Isûn a kuomah, “Philip, hi chen rau hi in kuomah ka um a, chuong khawm chun in mi la hriet naw ta rawp maw? Tûkhawm a mi hmu chu Pa hmu a nih. ‘Pa chu mîn hmutir rawh,’ ieng ti tia ti am i na?

en: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I say unto you I speak not from myself: but the Father abiding in me doeth his works.
hmr: Kei Paa ka um le, Pa keimaah a um ti in awi naw a ni? In kuoma thu ka hril hi keia phuokfâwmin ka hril nawh; Pa keimaah a um zing a, a thil a thaw lem hlak a nih.

en: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me: or else believe me for the very works’ sake.
hmr: Kei Paa ka um le keimaa Pa a um ti hi mi ring ro; annawleh, thilthaw lei bêk hin mi ring ro.

en: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also; and greater works than these shall he do; because I go unto the Father.
hmr: Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawmin a mi ring chun thil ka thawhai hi ama khawmin thaw vêng a tih; hieng nêka thil ropui khawm hi la thaw bawk a tih, Pa kuoma ka fe ding leiin.

en: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
hmr: Chun, keia hminga iengkhawm in hni taphawt chu, thaw pei ka tih, Pa, Naupa leia chawimawia a um theina dingin.

en: If ye shall ask anything in my name, that will I do.
hmr: Nangnîn keia hmingin ieng- khawm in mi hni chun, chu chu thaw pei ka tih.

en: If ye love me, ye will keep my commandments.
hmr: “Nangnîn in mi hmangai chun, ka thupêkhai chu zâwm in tih.

en: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may be with you for ever,
hmr: Chun, Pa hnîng ka ta, ama chun Thlamuongtu dang pêng a ti cheu, chatuona in kuoma um dingin;

en: even the Spirit of truth: whom the world cannot receive; for it beholdeth him not, neither knoweth him: ye know him; for he abideth with you, and shall be in you.
hmr: chu chu Thlarau indiktak a nih; khawvêlin chu chu an nei thei nawh, ama an hmu nawh a, an hriet bawk naw leiin. Nangnîn ama chu in hriet, in kuomah a um zing lei le, nangniah a um ding leiin.

en: I will not leave you desolate: I come unto you.
hmr: Fahrain fe san naw ning cheu; in kuomah hung nâwk ka tih.

en: Yet a little while, and the world beholdeth me no more; but ye behold me: because I live, ye shall live also.
hmr: Sâwt nawtê hnungah khaw- vêlin mi hmu nâwk ta naw ni, nisienlakhawm, nangni chun mi hmûng in tih; kei ka hring leiin nangni khawm hring in tih.

en: In that day ye shall know that I am in my Father, and ye in me, and I in you.
hmr: Chu nia chun kei ka Paa ka um dâm, nangni keimaa in um dâm, kei nangnia ka um dâm hre tâng in tih.

en: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself unto him.
hmr: Tukhawm ka thupêkhai nei a, zâwm chu a mi hmangaitu a nih; tûkhawm a mi hmangai chu, ka Pain hmangai a tih, kei khawmin ama chu hmangai ka tih, a kuomah inlâr rawp ka tih,” a ta.

en: Judas (not Iscariot) saith unto him, Lord, what is come to pass that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?
hmr: Chun, Juda (Iskariot naw lem) chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, keini kuomah inlâr i ta, khawvêl kuoma în lâr naw ding chu iengdinga?” a ta.

en: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my word: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
hmr: Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Mîn a mi hmangai chun ka thu zâwm a ta; ka Pain ama chu hmangai a ta, a kuomah hung kan ta, a kuomah um zing kan tih.

en: He that loveth me not keepeth not my words: and the word which ye hear is not mine, but the Father’s who sent me.
hmr: Tûkhawm a mi hmangai naw chun ka thu a zâwm nawh, thu in hriethai hi ka ta a ni nawh, Pa a mi tirtu ta a ni lem.

en: These things have I spoken unto you, while yet abiding with you.
hmr: In kuoma ka la um sûng hin hieng thu hi ka hril cheu hi.

en: But the Comforter, even the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring to your remembrance all that I said unto you.
hmr: Chun, Thlamuongtu, Thlarau Inthieng, Pain ka hminga a hung tir ding khan, ama chun iengkim inchûktir a ti cheu a, in kuoma ka hril po po kha inhriet suoktir nâwk a ti cheu.

en: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be fearful.
hmr: “Thlamuongna ka mâk pêk cheu hi; keima thlamuongna ka pêk cheu a; khawvêlin a pêk ang cheuin ka pêk naw cheu hi. In lungril lunginzîng naw raw se, ṭi khawm ṭi naw raw se.

en: Ye heard how I said to you, I go away, and I come unto you. If ye loved me, ye would have rejoiced, because I go unto the Father: for the Father is greater than I.
hmr: ‘Ka fe hmang ding a na, in kuomah hung nâwk ka tih’, ka tizie cheu kha in hriet tah. Nangnîn mi hmangai ni unla Pa kuoma ka fe ding a ni leiin in lâwm ding a nih; Pa chu keia nêkin a ropui lem sih a.

en: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye may believe.
hmr: Tuhin a hung tlung hma hin ka hril ta cheu hi, a hung tlung phaa in ringna dingin.

en: I will no more speak much with you, for the prince of the world cometh: and he hath nothing in me;
hmr: In kuomah thu hril nâwk mang ta naw ning, khawvêl lal a hung ding a ni sih a, ama chun keimaah iengkhawm a nei nawh,

en: but that the world may know that I love the Father, and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.
hmr: nisienlakhawm, keiin Pa ka hmangai le, Pain thu a mi pêk ang peiin thil ka thaw ti khawvêlin an hrietna ding a ni hi. Tho ro, hitaka hi suok ei tiu.
